Articles.Content:
I clean the hill with a vacuum cleaner

Self-legalized Cheap but Cheerful Non-Radioactive Chernobyl Hill

Thank you for cleaning.

My nice fresh Hill.
The Nice city authorities restrict the access to Hill for the sanitation reasons.
A military coup is staged against the Nice city authorities and the revolutionaries claim the hill as their own.

They were restricting the hill access due to the cow-made minefield covering it all.

So, of course the rebels may stay there...

But the Pol Police does. Non-natural radiations are now forbidden on Pol.

The rebelling act is not according to Pol Laws. Keep in mind that Pol is a place of pilmgrimage, as Kerbals love Hills above all.

My non-radiative and protected and sacred Hill.

P.S: We could make a whole story with some of the posts in this thread.

*The War of Hills — A KSP Story*.

**Edited <time datetime="2022-01-23T22:49:27Z" title="01/23/2022 10:49  PM" data-short="2 yr">January 23, 2022</time> by Nazalassa**

A poll was done on Pol and it was found that no body would touch the Police with a thousand foot pole. As such the Pol police were POLitely removed using a thousand and 1 foot pole and a new free and democratic society was created and I was given the hill to be the new capital.

Capital Hill.

**Edited <time datetime="2022-01-24T05:14:07Z" title="01/24/2022 05:14  AM" data-short="2 yr">January 24, 2022</time> by ColdJ**

The hill capturing is strictly prohibited.

Capital Punishment Hill

The Capital Punishment Law has been appealed.

Peaceful Hill

The peace makes the hillers weak and silly.

Peace Fool Hill

It is now April.

April Fool Hill.

In April it's my birthday. I get a hill gift.

My Hill I got for my birthday.

It was a Hill experience voucher. You enjoyed the hill for the day but now it is back with me.

My Experience Hill.
~~Ex-~~ Out-of-perience Hill
My peer to peer Hill.
Pear-to-Pear Hill

Apples to Apples, Dates to Dates.

My valley of the fruit.

Garfield eats all the fruits. A flood forces him to leve.

My flooded valley.

**Edited <time datetime="2022-01-25T21:09:20Z" title="01/25/2022 09:09  PM" data-short="2 yr">January 25, 2022</time> by Nazalassa**
  
\*text's gone\*

Using the valley as a mold I freeze the water, turn the world upside down and give it a good tap release my cast and then place my new Ice mountain range down.

My Ice Mountain Hills.

Oetzi gets released from the glacier above, wakes up, and owns the ice mountains.

Oetzi Mountain Hills

Oetzi takes one look at the modern world and decides it is not for them, then goes back to sleep.

My Ice Palace mountain.

The mice agree.

Mice Palace mountain.

They open a restaurant.

Rice Palace mountain.

A bird comes and starts eating the rice,

Cockatrice Palace mountain

Gorgon vs Cockatrice

Stone Mountain.
